abstract: Intel agreed on Monday to buy a 15 percent stake in ASML, a Dutch semiconductor equipment maker, in an investment that may total as much as $4.1 billion.
snippet: Intel agreed on Monday to buy a 15 percent stake in ASML, a Dutch semiconductor equipment maker, in an investment that may total as much as $4.1 billion.
lead_paragraph: Intel agreed Monday to buy a 15 percent stake in ASML Holding, a Dutch semiconductor equipment maker, in an investment that may total as much as $4.1 billion.

headline.main: Intel to Buy Stake in Dutch Semiconductor Equipment Firm

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
